en: He regrets having been lazy.
He is very hard on lazy people.
He was fired on the grounds that he was lazy.
He's too lazy to apply himself to anything.
zh: 他太懒了，干什么都不上心。

en: He's not lazy. On the contrary, I think he's a hard worker.
zh: 他不懒，相反，我觉得他工作挺努力的。

en: He was dismissed of the grounds that he was idle.
zh: 他因为无所事事被辞退了。

en: He was dismissed on the grounds that he was lazy.
He is a lazy fellow.
He is inclined to be lazy.
He idles away the time.
He looked around the waiting room.
He regretted having been idle.
zh: 他后悔以前太无所事事了。

en: He's sitting in the waiting room.
He could no longer wait and so went home.
He deliberately kept on provoking a confrontation.
He exhausted all his energy.
He was wet all over.
He is good at gymnastics.
He tried to reduce his weight.
He is putting on weight.
He is two hundred pounds in weight.
He's well built.
He did not walk into the gym.
In washing himself, he started on the legs.
zh: 他洗澡的时候先从腿开始洗。

en: His body was shaking in anger.
He seemed worried about his health.
zh: 他看起来挺担心自己的身体的。

en: He stretched and took a deep breath.
zh: 他伸了个懒腰，深吸了一口气。

en: He lost his balance and fell down.
He is in good physical condition.
He's in good physical condition.
He had taken care of himself.
He had taken to drinking more than was good for him.
zh: 他开始贪杯，喝得有点过头了。

en: He has a high batting average.
He made a motion that we stop and rest awhile.
zh: 他示意我们停下来歇一会儿。

en: He is busier than Taro.
He's busier than Taro.
He is more famous than Taro.
He is Taro's brother.
He is Taro's older brother.
He failed in the attempt to sail across the Pacific Ocean.
zh: 他尝试横渡太平洋，但失败了。

en: He has twice flown the Pacific.
He's on a diet because he is a little overweight.
zh: 他在减肥，因为他有点偏胖。

en: He was large, not to say fat.
zh: 他块头很大，倒不是说他胖。

en: His voice is thin even though he is fat.
zh: 别看他胖，他的声音倒挺细的。

en: He has a thick neck.
He had to master a lot of new information and spend some time in different parts of the country.
zh: 他得掌握大量新信息，还得在全国各地跑一段时间。

en: He was so busy that he sent his son instead of going himself.
zh: 他忙得不可开交，就让他儿子替他去了。

en: He was busy, and yet he came to help us.
zh: 他虽然很忙，但还是抽空来帮我们了。

en: He could be in the gymnasium.
He is not likely to succeed.
He will probably fail.
He carried on business for many years.
He traveled with a large escort.
He has written a number of exciting detective stories.
zh: 他写了不少挺精彩的侦探小说。

en: He understands her problems more or less.
zh: 他对她的问题多少了解一点。

en: He has some knowledge of editing.
He was somewhat excited.
He is more or less drunk.
He was more or less drunk.
zh: 他那时候多少有点醉了。

en: He has a lot of hobbies.
He has run up large debts.
He bestowed a large amount of money on the institute.
zh: 他给那个研究所捐了一大笔钱。

en: He deposited a lot of money in the bank.
zh: 他在银行里存了不少钱。

en: He is not a man to deal with a lot of problems.
zh: 他不是那种能处理很多麻烦的人。

en: He broke through many problems easily.
zh: 他轻轻松松就解决了很多问题。

en: He devoted himself to many cultural activities.
zh: 他参加了很多文化活动。

en: He is different from the people around him.
zh: 他跟周围的人不太一样。

en: He had to spend many barren days.
zh: 他不得不度过很多平淡无奇的日子。

en: He is superior to me in many respects.
zh: 他在很多方面都比我强。

en: He is great in many ways.
zh: 他在很多方面都很出色。

en: He asked the same question of many people.
zh: 他问了很多人同一个问题。

en: He is well spoken of by many people.
He likes playing soccer with a lot of people watching.
zh: 他喜欢在有很多人看的时候踢足球。

en: He is confronted by many difficulties.
He did the work in spite of many obstacles.
zh: 尽管有很多障碍，他还是把活儿干完了。

en: He received a lot of praise.
He devoted much time to study.
He devoted a lot of time to study.
zh: 他在学习上投入了很多时间。

en: He had to undergo many trials.
He is endowed with many talents.
He has overcome many obstacles.
He told us he had gone through many hardships.
zh: 他告诉我们他吃了不少苦。

en: He overcame many difficulties.
He succeeded in the face of many difficulties.
zh: 他顶着重重困难成功了。

en: He was elected as chairman from among many candidates.
zh: 他从众多候选人中当选为主席。

en: He threw away a bunch of old letters.
zh: 他扔掉了一大叠旧信件。

en: He had to go through a lot of hardships.
zh: 他不得不经历很多磨难。

en: He was exposed to many dangers.
zh: 他曾身处很多危险之中。

en: He embarked on his marriage with many hopes and fears.
zh: 他带着期待又忐忑的心情步入了婚姻。

en: A lot of troubles preyed upon his mind.
zh: 很多烦心事一直困扰着他。

en: He has no more than five English books.
zh: 他只有不到五本英文书。

en: He has not more than a hundred novels.
zh: 他的小说总共也就一百来本。

en: He can dish it out, but he can't take it.
zh: 他能损别人，但受不了别人损他。

en: He is above deceiving others.
He has a faculty for making other people happy.
zh: 他天生就有让别人开心的本事。

en: He is apt to ridicule others.
He invades the privacy of others.
He is indifferent to the suffering of others.
zh: 他对别人的痛苦漠不关心。

en: He is chary of offending people.
He behaved himself so as not to give offence to others.
zh: 他表现得很得体，以免得罪别人。

en: He says what he thinks regardless of other people's feelings.
zh: 他不顾别人的感受，有什么说什么。

en: He pays no attention to others' feelings.
zh: 他一点都不顾及别人的感受。

en: He is not the sort of man who counts on others for help.
zh: 他不是那种指望别人帮忙的人。

en: He drew on others for help.
He is the last person to speak ill of others.
zh: 他最不可能在背后说人坏话了。

en: He makes it a rule never to speak ill of others.
zh: 他这人有个原则，就是从不说别人坏话。

en: He was willing to work for others.
He is above finding fault with others.
zh: 他不屑于去挑别人的刺。

en: He's not the kind of person who finds fault with others.
zh: 他不是那种爱挑剔别人的人。

en: He's not the kind of person who always criticizes others.
zh: 他不是那种总是批评别人的人。

en: He has little feeling for others.
He told me to be kind to others.
zh: 他叫我要对别人好一点。

en: It is not in his nature to be hard on other people.
zh: 他天生就不是个对人苛刻的人。

en: He promised not to tell.
zh: 他答应过不告诉别人的。

en: He is on another line.
He was the scorn of the other boys.
He stood out from the rest of the boys.
zh: 他在男生中表现很出众。

en: He is better than anyone else.
He worked as hard as anybody else.
zh: 他干活跟别人一样卖力。

en: Along with thousands of others, he fled the country.
zh: 他和成千上万的人一起逃离了那个国家。

en: He was punished as a warning to other students.
zh: 处罚他是为了给其他学生一个警告。

en: He should be given preference over the others.
He is working hard to catch up with the others.
zh: 他正努力工作，想赶上别人。

en: He is taller than any other boy.
zh: 他比其他任何男生都要高。

en: He's got more books than all the others put together.
zh: 他的书比其他所有人加起来都多。

en: He is preoccupied with something else.
He is a teacher apart from the rest.
zh: 他是个与众不同的老师。

en: He is imitative of other artists.
zh: 他总是在模仿其他艺术家的风格。

en: He is far in advance of the other students.
zh: 他比其他学生领先得多。

en: He is bigger than all the other boys.
zh: 他比其他所有男生都壮。

en: He worships money to exclusion of everything else.
zh: 他眼里只有钱，别的什么都不顾。

en: He works as hard as any other student.
zh: 他学习跟别的学生一样刻苦。

en: How else can he act?
He left his poorly paid job for greener pastures elsewhere.
zh: 他辞掉了那份工资低的工作，去别处另谋高就了。

en: He is known to everyone in the village.
He doesn't mingle with the villagers.
zh: 他不怎么跟村里人来往。

en: He is said to have been the richest man in the village.
zh: 据说他以前是村里的首富。

en: He bent his steps toward the village.
He went fishing in a river near the village.
zh: 他去村子附近的河里钓鱼了。

en: He asked the first person he met near the village.
zh: 他在村子附近随便找了个路人问了问。

en: He worked as hard as any man in the village.
zh: 他干活跟村里任何一个男人一样卖力。

en: He is known to the villagers for his diligence.
zh: 他因为勤奋而在村里出名。

en: He resigned from the job to take the responsibility for the loss.
zh: 他为了承担损失而引咎辞职了。

en: He is regarded as the best doctor in the village.
zh: 他被公认为是村里最好的医生。

en: He suffered great losses.
He estimated the loss at five million yen.
zh: 他估计损失大约有五百万日元。

en: He will make amends for the damage.
He sat surrounded by his grandchildren.
zh: 他坐着，孙子孙女们围在他身边。

en: He dotes on his grandson.
He is happiest when he is with his grandchildren.
zh: 跟孙子孙女在一起时，是他最开心的时候。

en: After graduation he will engage himself in study.
zh: 他毕业后打算继续深造。

en: He was forced to work more than five hours on end.
zh: 他被迫连续干了五个多小时。

en: He applied himself to his study, without thought for his normal life.
zh: 他一心扑在学习上，完全不顾生活。

en: He was charged with speeding.
He hit a speed ball with his bat.
zh: 他用球棒击中了一个快球。

en: He is so old that he cannot walk quickly.
He can run fast.
He is too fat to run fast.
He is a fast runner.
He runs fast.
He made up for lost time by running fast.
zh: 他跑得飞快，把耽误的时间追了回来。

en: He can swim fast.
He walked at a quick pace.
He went off in a hurry.
He sprained his ankle.
He apologized to me for stepping on my foot.
zh: 他因为踩了我的脚向我道歉。

en: He sat silently with his legs crossed.
zh: 他跷着二郎腿，一声不吭地坐着。

en: He sat with his legs crossed.
He sat there with his legs crossed.
zh: 他跷着二郎腿坐在那儿。

en: He was crying with pain when he broke his leg.
zh: 他腿摔断的时候疼得直哭。

en: When he broke his leg he was screaming out in pain.
zh: 他腿摔断的时候疼得直叫。

en: He broke his leg, but looked none the worse for it.
zh: 他腿断了，但看着跟没事儿人一样。

en: He dragged his feet.
When he broke his leg, he had to use crutches for 3 months.
zh: 他腿断了以后，拄了三个月的拐。

en: He felt something crawl up his leg.
zh: 他觉得有什么东西顺着腿爬了上来。

en: He touched the water with his foot.
He is slow of foot.
He has long legs.
He kicked the ball with his foot.
He is a quick walker.
He was unsteady on his feet.
He was out of breath. He had been running.
zh: 他气喘吁吁的，刚才一直在跑。

en: He was out of breath because he had been running.
zh: 他因为一直在跑，累得气喘吁吁的。

en: He was out of breath.
He settled his property on his sons.
zh: 他把家产都分给了儿子们。

en: He told his sons to help each other after his death.
zh: 他嘱咐儿子们在他死后要互相照应。

en: He was out of shape when he took a long hike with his sons, and he was stiff and sore the next day.
zh: 他带儿子们去长途徒步，体力有点跟不上，第二天浑身酸痛。

en: He admonished his son for being lazy.
He walked the streets looking for his son.
zh: 他在街上走着，寻找他的儿子。

en: He made his son a teacher.
He recognized his son as lawful heir.
zh: 他承认儿子是合法继承人。

en: He has a deep affection for his son.
He established his son in trade.
He is proud of his son.
He prides himself on his son.
He bound his son to a tailor.
zh: 他送儿子去当裁缝学徒。

en: He takes pride in his son.
He made his son a wealthy man.
He could not send his son to school.
He made his son a doctor.
He named his son James.
zh: 他给儿子起名叫詹姆斯。

en: He had the gratification of seeing his son graduate from collage.
zh: 看到儿子大学毕业，他感到很欣慰。

en: He is very much concerned about the future of his son.
zh: 他非常担心儿子的未来。

en: He pulled his son by the ear.
He shook his son by the shoulder.
zh: 他抓着儿子的肩膀晃了晃。

en: He tried to break his son's habit of smoking.
zh: 他想让儿子改掉抽烟的习惯。

en: He made a model airplane for his son.
zh: 他给儿子做了一个飞机模型。

en: He was angry with his son.
He left a large fortune to his son.
zh: 他给儿子留了一大笔财产。

en: He equipped his son with the will to persevere.
zh: 他培养了儿子坚韧不拔的意志。

en: He left his son a large fortune.
zh: 他给儿子留了一大笔钱。

en: He bequeathed a considerable fortune to his son.
zh: 他把一大笔遗产留给了儿子。

en: He was bereaved of his son.
He must buy a new bicycle for his son.
zh: 他得给儿子买辆新自行车。

en: He built his son a new house.
zh: 他给儿子盖了一栋新房子。

en: He turned over the business to his son.
He wants to equip his son with a good education.
zh: 他想让儿子接受良好的教育。

en: He seems disappointed with his son.
zh: 他好像对儿子挺失望的。

en: He seems disappointed in his son.
zh: 他看起来对儿子很失望。

en: He has decided to turn over his business to his son.
zh: 他决定把生意传给儿子。

en: He kept it secret that he had bought a bicycle for his son.
zh: 他瞒着儿子偷偷给他买了一辆自行车。

en: He will commit suicide if he can't see his son.
zh: 要是见不到儿子，他就不想活了。

en: He was impatient to see his son.
He was in a hurry to see his son.
zh: 他急急忙忙地去见儿子。

en: He taught his son how to swim.
He left his son a fortune.
zh: 他给儿子留了一笔遗产。

en: He made his son a chair.
zh: 他给儿子做了一把椅子。

en: He tried to wean his son from his bad habit.
zh: 他试着帮儿子改掉坏习惯。

en: He encouraged his son to study harder.
zh: 他鼓励儿子多用功读书。

en: He set his son up as a baker.
zh: 他帮儿子开了家面包店。

en: He has transferred all his knowledge to his son.
zh: 他把自己的毕生所学都传授给了儿子。

en: He has transmitted all his knowledge to his son.
zh: 他把所有的知识都教给了儿子。

en: He bought his son a camera.
He told his son an interesting story.
zh: 他给儿子讲了一个有趣的故事。

en: He flew a kite with his son.
He gave money to each of his sons.
zh: 他给每个儿子都发了钱。

en: He behaved badly to his sons.
He is glad about his son's love of books.
He died on the day his son arrived.
zh: 他在儿子到的那天去世了。

en: He was overjoyed to find out that his son had succeeded.
zh: 知道儿子成功了，他高兴坏了。

en: He had his son die last year.
He congratulated his son on being a top prizewinner.
He says his son can count up to 100 now.
zh: 他说他儿子现在能数到100了。

en: He seems to be having trouble breathing.
He was gasping for breath as he ran.
He arrived at the station out of breath.
zh: 他气喘吁吁地赶到了车站。

en: He drew a deep breath.
He held his breath.
He watched it holding his breath.
He was watching the scene with breathless interest.
zh: 他屏息凝神地看着那一幕。

en: He has drawn his last breath.
He breathed his last.
He went to the station out of breath.
zh: 他上气不接下气地跑到了车站。

en: He lay breathing very feebly.
zh: 他躺在那，呼吸非常微弱。

en: He spoke for ten minutes without a pause.
He won an immediate response.
He made a splendid off-the-cuff speech.
zh: 他做了一段超棒的即兴演讲。

en: He put emphasis on the necessity for immediate action.
zh: 他强调必须立刻采取行动。

en: He immediately sought a response.
He consented on the spot.
He retorted immediately.
He paid me cash down.
He disdained bribery.
He accumulated his library.
zh: 他的那些藏书是慢慢攒起来的。

en: You can't hate the guy.
He clinched the election when he came out against a tax increase.
zh: 他通过反对加税锁定了胜局。

en: He heard the noise.
The noise startled him.
zh: 那个噪音把他吓了一跳。

en: He was awoken by the noise.
The noise distracted him from studying.
zh: 噪音让他没法专心学习。

en: He glanced at the noisy child with a sour expression.
zh: 他一脸嫌弃地瞄了一眼那个吵闹的小孩。

en: He is at the head of runners.
He was running and calling for help.
He runs very fast.
He can run so fast!
He cannot walk, let alone run.
zh: 他连走都走不动，更别说跑了。

en: He does run.
He runs.
He has given up running in order to focus on the long jump.
zh: 为了专心练跳远，他放弃了跑步。

en: He ran on and on, until he was completely exhausted.
zh: 他一直跑个不停，直到精疲力竭。

en: He began to run.
When he finished running, he was happy.
He began running.
He bettered the world record in the high jump.
zh: 他刷新了跳高世界纪录。

en: He ran and ran, but could not catch up with his dog.
zh: 他跑了半天也没追上他的狗。

en: He came running.
He came running into the room.
He ran to school, arriving in time.
zh: 他跑去学校，准时赶到了。

en: He's run off ten pounds.
He did run.
He ran.
He lay down on the grass.
He lay down on the grass and went to sleep.
He was lying on the grass.
For all his cleverness, he is always reluctant to give his views.
zh: 尽管他很聪明，但他总是不愿发表看法。

en: I believe him to be intelligent.
He aspired to the position of Prime Minister.
He firmly refused the Premier's earnest request.
zh: 他断然拒绝了总理的诚挚恳求。

en: He kept the window closed.
He kept all the windows open.
He denies having broken the window.
zh: 他不承认窗户是他打破的。

en: He tried to open the window.
He slept with the window open.
He hammered at the window.
He looked out of the window.
He came in through the window.
He went out the window.
He was looking out the window.
He is a little light for a sumo wrestler.
zh: 对相扑选手来说，他有点太轻了。

en: He watched the Sumo wrestling with folded arms.
zh: 他双手抱在胸前看相扑。

en: He seems as busy as ever.
He is as busy as ever.
He looks as poor as ever.
He always remained poor.
He is as poor as ever.
He is as kind as ever.
He looks as young as ever.
He's a crybaby, just like always.
zh: 他还是老样子，是个爱哭鬼。

en: He works well, just as usual.
zh: 他还是跟平常一样干得挺好。

en: He is as lazy as ever.
He works as hard as ever, but he remains poor.
zh: 他还是一样拼命干活，但还是挺穷的。

en: He is his usual self.
He still kept on smoking.
He is as talkative as ever.
zh: 他还是跟以前一样话多。

en: He has accumulated quite a collection of books.
He has a fairly large fortune.
He has nobody to consult.
zh: 他连个商量的人都没有。

en: He got the better of his opponent.
He knocked his opponent out.
He had a slight edge on his opponent.
zh: 他比对手稍微强那么一点。

en: I find a good rival in him.
zh: 我觉得他是个很棒的对手。

en: He joined the opposing team.
He received a tremendous punch on the jaw from his opponent.
zh: 他的下巴挨了对手重重的一拳。

en: He makes it a habit to keep good hours.
He kept early hours.
He is in the habit of keeping early hours.
He is a fast speaker.
He believed in getting up early in the morning.
He makes a habit of waking up early.
He is used to getting up early.
He wakes up early.
He gets up early.
He's an early bird.
He is an early riser.
He tried to get up early.
He makes nothing of getting up early in the morning.
zh: 对他来说早起根本不算什么。

en: He promised me to come early.
He was impatient to see his daughter.
He started to go to bed early.
He arrived too early.
He went to bed early.
He went to bed early but did not go to sleep until almost 2 in the morning.
zh: 他睡得很早，但直到快两点才睡着。

en: He advised an early start.
He left early; otherwise he could not have caught the train.
zh: 他走得挺早，不然就赶不上火车了。

en: He did not get up early.
He does not get up early.
He was granted permission to leave early.
He was granted permission to go home early.
He is very proud of his skill as a pilot.
zh: 他对自己飞行员的技术感到非常自豪。

en: He used to be an imaginative boy.
zh: 他以前是个很有想象力的男孩子。

en: He has a rich imagination.
He is working as a security guard at a warehouse.
He attracted votes away from both candidates.
zh: 他把那两个候选人的选票都给拉走了。

en: He watched the horse racing through his binoculars.
He watched the horse race with his binoculars.
He watched the horse race using his binoculars.
zh: 他是通过望远镜看赛马的。

en: He is barren of creative spirit.
He practices austerities almost like a monk.
zh: 他的生活过得简直像个苦行僧。

en: He tried to appeal.
He has poor ability to organize.
He met a nice young man.
zh: 他遇到了一个挺不错的小伙子。

en: He was dropped because of his running mate.
zh: 他因为竞选搭档的原因出局了。

en: He became a nice young man.
zh: 他长成了一个挺不错的小伙子。

en: He got up quickly, splashed cold water on his face, brushed his teeth, and shaved.
zh: 他迅速起床，往脸上泼了把冷水，刷了牙并刮了胡子。

en: He got up quickly, splashed cold water on his face, brushed his teeth and shaved.
zh: 他很快就起床了，用凉水洗了把脸，刷牙还刮了胡子。

en: He acquired French quickly.
He can bend an iron rod with his hands.
He was suspended from school for a week for bad conduct.
zh: 他因为表现不好被学校停学了一周。

en: He's misunderstood because of his vulgar language.
zh: 他说话太粗鲁，所以经常被人误解。

en: He is content with the simple life.
zh: 他很满足于这种简朴的生活。

en: He seems rough, but at heart he is very gentle.
zh: 他看着挺粗放的，但心肠其实很软。

en: He was raised by his grandmother.
He resembles his grandfather.
He adores his grandfather.
He is afraid of his grandfather.
He is the picture of his grandfather.
zh: 他跟他爷爷简直是一个模子里刻出来的。

en: He was educated by his grandfather.
zh: 他由他爷爷一手带大并教育。

en: He is burning with love of his country.
He betrayed his country.
He did his best to rescue her.
He did his best only to fail again.
zh: 他拼尽了全力，结果还是失败了。

en: He gives work all he's got, and gets more work done than anybody else.
zh: 他干活拼尽全力，比谁干得都多。

en: He used all his strength to crawl out of the wrecked car.
zh: 他使出全身力气从撞坏的车里爬了出来。

en: He ran at full speed.
He was driving the car at full speed.
zh: 他把车开到了最快速度。

en: He tried with all his might to lift the box.
zh: 他使出吃奶的劲儿想搬起那个箱子。

en: He ran as fast as his legs could carry him.
He drove his sports car at full speed.
He headed for the door at full speed.
He didn't study at all.
He never seems to grow older.
He is anything but honest.
He didn't speak to me at all.
He doesn't watch television at all.
He doesn't watch TV at all.
He didn't explain it at all.
He went heart and soul into the work.
zh: 他全身心地投入到了工作中。

en: He was covered with mud from head to foot.
He was covered in mud from head to foot.
He was an example of a popular athlete in his days.
zh: 他在那个时代是个很红的运动员。

en: He gave body and soul to his job.
zh: 他把全身心都交给了工作。

en: He is attention itself.
He is giving his whole attention to that.
zh: 他正全神贯注地做那件事。

en: He was covered all over with paint.
He was covered with bruises.
He consumed all his income on drinking.
zh: 他把收入全花在喝酒上了。

en: He sustained an injury which will take a month to heal completely.
zh: 他受了伤，得一个月才能好利索。

en: He handed over all his property to his son.
zh: 他把所有财产都交给了他儿子。

en: He is said to have lost all his money.
He lost his all.
He lost everything he owned.
He risked losing all his fortune.
zh: 他冒着倾家荡产的风险。

en: He put all his fortune in the enterprise.
zh: 他把全部家当都投进了那家企业。

en: He had got nationwide fame.
He has got well, so that he can work now.
zh: 他病好了，现在可以去干活了。

en: He has fully recovered and can already work again.
zh: 他已经康复了，可以重新开始工作了。

en: He has completely recovered and can go back to work.
zh: 他已经痊愈了，可以回去上班了。

en: He won the prize for excellence in all subjects.
zh: 他各门功课都很优秀，拿了奖。

en: He did well in all subjects, particularly mathematics.
zh: 他各科成绩都很好，尤其是数学。

en: He ordered that everybody get up at six.
zh: 他命令所有人六点起床。

en: He's perfect at everything.
zh: 他这人干什么都追求完美。

en: He attributed everything to himself.
zh: 他把所有的功劳都揽到了自己身上。

en: He was in favor of equality for all.
He broke with all his relatives.
zh: 他跟所有的亲戚都断了往来。

en: He used all his wealth for the benefit of the poor.
zh: 他把所有的钱财都用来接济穷人了。

en: He is quite capable and can hold his own.
zh: 他挺有本事的，能独当一面。

en: He assumed a new identity.
He said it was out of the question.
zh: 他说那是绝对不可能的。

en: He felt utterly humiliated.
He is every bit a politician.
zh: 他是个地地道道的政客。

en: He seems to be bankrupt of all tender feeling.
zh: 他这人好像一点儿感情都没有。

en: He denies himself nothing.
He arrived quite out of the blue.
He did not speak at all.
He was left all alone in the woods.
zh: 他被一个人丢在森林里了。

en: He is quite a savage.
He was not at all satisfied with the result.
zh: 他对那个结果一点儿也不满意。

en: He is far from honest.
He is a good boy, and what is better, very handsome.
zh: 他是个好孩子，而且长得还挺帅。

en: He is the epitome of goodness.
He is not so stupid as to be unable to tell right from wrong.
zh: 他还没傻到连是非都分不清。

en: He meditated on the problem of good and evil.
He can't tell right from wrong.
He cannot tell right from wrong.
He can't distinguish vice from virtue.
He is old enough to tell good from evil.
zh: 他长大了，该懂得分是非了。

en: He doesn't know the difference between right and wrong.
He seized on the unprecedented opportunity.
zh: 他抓住了这个前所未有的机会。

en: He lost the watch which he had bought the day before.
zh: 他把前天刚买的手表弄丢了。

en: It seems that he is a promising youth.
zh: 看来他是个很有前途的年轻人。

en: He is a promising young man.
zh: 他是个很有出息的小伙子。

en: He has a bright future.
He said a few words by way of preface.
zh: 他说了几句话当作开场白。

en: He concentrated on his study of prepositions.
He was sent into combat.
He decided neither to advance nor to retreat.
He was elected to the Senate in the last election.
zh: 他在上次选举中当选为参议员。

en: He amassed a fortune in stock trading during the last boom.
zh: 他在上次股市大涨的时候炒股发了一笔。

en: He is better off than he was.
zh: 他现在日子过得比以前好了。

en: He sent his luggage in advance.
He arrived at nine in accordance with a prearranged plan.
zh: 他按照事先定好的计划九点到了。

en: He doesn't study as hard as he used to.
zh: 他不像以前学得那么努力了。

en: He said that he had met her on the previous day.
He gave the same answer as before.
zh: 他的回答还是跟之前一样。

en: He has been to Switzerland before.
He is prepossessed with an ill opinion.
zh: 他这人先入为主，存有偏见。

en: He is not old enough to vote.
zh: 他还没到能投票的年纪。

en: He fought a successful election campaign.
zh: 他打了一场漂亮的选战。

en: He was chosen by election.
zh: 他是通过选举选出来的。

en: He won the election by a large majority.
zh: 他以绝对多数票赢得了选举。

en: It is apparent that he will win the election.
zh: 显然他会赢得这次选举。

en: He is fighting with his back to the wall in the election.
zh: 他在选举中已经背水一战了。

en: He saved a sailor.
He wanted to go to sea.
He became a sailor.
He had heard stories about an ancient god who had left his land centuries before by ship.
zh: 他听过一些关于一位远古神明的传说，说那位神几百年前乘船离开了故土。

en: He fell overboard and was drowned.
He is delicate.
He was baptized a Catholic.
He was wounded in the fight.
He has never really got over malaria he caught in the East during the war.
zh: 战争期间他在东方染上的疟疾一直没彻底好。

en: He presented an argument for the war.
zh: 他提出了支持战争的论点。

en: He was wounded in the war.
He lost two sons in the war.
zh: 他的两个儿子在战争中牺牲了。

en: He gambled on the war coming to an early end.
He cheated death many times on the battlefield.
zh: 他在战场上多次死里逃生。

en: He demonstrated his courage by his actions in battle.
zh: 他在战斗中的表现证明了他的勇气。

en: He was killed in the war.
He is believed to have been killed in action.
He was slain in battle.
He is a war orphan.
He accumulated a tremendous fortune during the post war.
He got across the river.
He crossed the river.
He swam across the river.
He went fishing in the river.
He lives across the river.
He sat at the edge of the stream.
He sat next to the stream.
He fell into the river.
He walked along the river.
He drowned while swimming in the river.
zh: 他在河里游泳时淹死了。

en: He is swimming in the river.
He drowned in the river.
He has excellent techniques which would outdo a specialist.
zh: 他的技术非常出色，甚至超过了专家。

en: Since he is not an expert, his opinion is no account.
zh: 既然他不是专家，他的意见也就没什么分量。

en: He transferred to the office in Chiba.
zh: 他调到了千叶的办公室。

en: He is an absolute monarch.
He took out a 1,000-yen note from his wallet.
zh: 他从钱包里拿出一张一千日元的钞票。

en: He is the man you met the other day.
zh: 他就是你前几天见到的那个人。

en: He is a born poet.
He came back home a while ago.
He made a fool of his teacher.
He ran off to meet his teacher.
He made much of his teacher's advice.
He followed the lead of our teacher.
He made notes of the teacher's lecture.
zh: 他记下了老师讲课的笔记。

en: He pays no attention to the teacher.
zh: 他一点儿也不听老师的话。

en: He never pays much attention to what his teacher says.
zh: 他从来不把老师说的话当回事。

en: He tried to write down everything the teacher said.
zh: 他试图记下老师说的每一句话。

en: He will present a book to his teacher.
He studied the harder because he was praised by his teacher.
zh: 因为被老师夸了，他学习更刻苦了。

en: He made a polite bow to his teacher.
zh: 他礼貌地向老师鞠了个躬。

en: He had an intense hatred of his teacher.
I'm of the opinion that he should apologize to his teacher.
zh: 我觉得他应该向老师道歉。

en: He seems not to be cut out for teaching.
zh: 他看起来不是当老师的料。

en: He's not cut out for teaching.
He asked his teacher stupid questions.
zh: 他问了老师一些愚蠢的问题。

en: He stuck out his tongue at his teacher.
He studied all the harder for being praised by his teacher.
zh: 因为受到了老师的夸奖，他学习更努力了。

en: He made up his mind to be a teacher.
He had no thought of becoming a teacher.
zh: 他根本没想过要当老师。

en: He bowed to his teacher.
He asked his teacher several questions.
He was respected both as a teacher and as a man.
zh: 无论是作为老师还是作为一个人，他都备受尊敬。

en: Is he a teacher?
He was given a gold watch by the teacher.
He believes it to be an honor to follow in his predecessor's footsteps.
zh: 他觉得能追随前辈的脚步是一种荣幸。

en: He was out of town last week.
He seems to have been sick last week.
He quit school last week.
He managed to get himself promoted last week.
He intended to have visited the temple last week.
zh: 他本来打算上周去那个寺庙的。

en: He went to America last week.
He moved to Tokyo last month.
He divorced his wife last month.
I hear he has been ill since last month.
zh: 听说他从上个月起就一直病着。

en: He set out for Paris last month.
zh: 他上个月动身去巴黎了。

en: He is said to have won the speech contest last month.
zh: 听说他上个月演讲比赛拿了奖。

en: He earned as much as 100,000 yen working part-time last month.
zh: 他上个月打工赚了足足十万日元。

en: He uses a pencil with a fine point.
The urge to brag on his recent successes was irresistible.
zh: 他忍不住想炫耀一下最近取得的成功。

en: He changed trains at Sendai Station.
He does not live in Sendai.
His life is despaired of.
He lost hope and killed himself by taking poison.
He came home in despair.
zh: 他垂头丧气地回到了家。

en: He gave up the attempt in despair.
He has absolute power.
He never touched wine.
I'm afraid he will never admit his guilt.
He was determined to go, so I decided to do my best to help him.
zh: 他铁了心要去，所以我决定尽力帮他。

en: He is obstinate in his opinion.
He has had absolutely no part in the conspiracy; it was not he, but his brother, who had an axe to grind against the government.
zh: 他绝对没参与阴谋；是他哥对政府心怀不满，不是他。

en: He is always saying bad things about others.
He lost his way in the snow.
He was late because of the snow.
His explanation was by no means satisfactory.
zh: 他的解释一点儿也不让人满意。

en: He argued away her concern.
zh: 他的一番说辞消除了她的顾虑。

en: I argued him into consent.
By virtue of frugality he has made a fortune.
He is suspected of robbery.
He is easy to get on with.
It seems that he likes collecting stamps.
He has collected twice as many stamps as I have.
zh: 他收集的邮票是我的两倍。

en: He collected a lot of stamps.
He has collected no fewer than five hundred stamps.
zh: 他收集了不下五百张邮票。

en: He drank a glass of red wine.
He did not stop his car at the red light.
He is no better than a baby.
He's just like a baby.
He is a total stranger to me.
He covered himself with shame.
He looked after the baby.
He picked up a red stone.
zh: 他捡起了一块红色的石头。

en: He decided on a red car.
zh: 他选定了一辆红色的车。

en: He wore red pants.
A man of responsibility, he didn't leave the matter alone.
zh: 他是个负责任的人，没把这事儿晾在那儿不管。

en: He has a strong sense of responsibility.
He fixed the blame on his friends.
zh: 他把责任推到了朋友身上。

en: He's a take-charge boss.
zh: 他是个挺有担当的老板。

en: He was appointed to a responsible post.
zh: 他被派去担任一个要职。

en: He's active doing charity work.
He is famous as an oil king.
zh: 他是出了名的石油大王。

en: He made a fortune in oil.
He is said to have made a fortune in oil.
zh: 听说他是靠搞石油发家的。

en: He broke the window by throwing a stone.
zh: 他扔石头把窗户给砸了。

en: He threw a stone into the pond.
zh: 他往池塘里扔了一块石头。

en: He weighed the stone in his hand.
zh: 他在手里掂了掂那块石头。

en: He threw a stone at a dog.
He picked up a stone.
He remained silent like a stone.
zh: 他像块石头似的一声不吭。

en: He used to be a man of fortune.
He used to be a quiet man.
zh: 他以前是个挺安静的人。

en: He is better off than he used to be.
zh: 他现在过得比以前好了。

en: He is less healthy than he used to be.
He is not as well off as he used to be.
zh: 他现在过得没以前好了。

en: He is not so diligent as he used to be.
He does not work so hard as he used to.
zh: 他干活没以前那么卖力了。

en: He doesn't work as hard as he used to.
zh: 他干活没以前那么拼命了。

en: He used to drink.
He told me how he had once been a rich man.
zh: 他跟我说过他以前怎么有钱过。

en: He used to be a nice boy.
zh: 他以前是个挺乖的小男孩。

en: He used to be a gentleman.
He is not the cheerful man he was.
zh: 他不像以前那么开朗了。

en: He must have gone to see his old friend.
zh: 他肯定是去找他的老朋友了。

en: He is different from what he used to be.
He is not what he used to be.
zh: 他已经不是以前的那个他了。

en: It is said that he has a lot of old coins.
They say that he has a lot of old money.
He looks like a completely different person to what he was before.
zh: 他看起来跟以前比简直变了个人。

en: He's always been kind to me.
He once lied and told her a rare creature lived in her closet.
zh: 他曾骗她说，她衣柜里住着个稀有生物。

en: He is immune from taxes.
He prefers the quiet.
He lives in peace.
He walked quietly.
He quietly knocked at the door.
He quietly knocked on the door.
He made a motion to be silent.
zh: 他做了个别出声的手势。

en: He told us to keep quiet.
He put his finger to his lips as a sign to be quiet.
zh: 他把手指放在嘴唇上，示意大家安静。

en: He loves to hike in the quiet countryside.
zh: 他喜欢在宁静的乡下徒步。

en: He has a lot of books for the young.
zh: 他有很多写给年轻人的书。

en: He was so angry that his veins stood out.
zh: 他气得青筋都爆出来了。

en: He lost color.
He thinks that blue is the most beautiful color.
zh: 他觉得蓝色是最漂亮的颜色。

en: He has blue eyes and fair hair.
zh: 他是蓝眼睛，头发颜色很浅。

en: He has blue eyes and blond hair.
He had a blue jacket on.
zh: 他当时穿着一件蓝夹克。

en: He was dressed in blue.
He has a blue coat on.
He protested that he was innocent.
He devoted himself whole-heartedly to her.
He has a reputation for integrity.
He likes Western culture.
He is bent on becoming a vocalist.
He sang with his voice strained.
He dropped his voice.
He shouted at the top of his voice.
He has a loud voice.
He acted like a saint.
He's dying to see Seiko.
He is an energetic politician.
zh: 他是个精力充沛的政治家。

en: He was mentally troubled.
He checked out of the hotel.
He did his best but soon saw that he could not compete with such a fast runner.
zh: 他尽力了，但很快发现自己根本跑不过人家。

en: He is by nature a generous person.
zh: 他天生就是个大方的人。

en: He is still fully active.
He is endowed with a sense of humor.
He is a poet by birth.
He insured himself.
He even referred to the origin of life.
zh: 他甚至提到了生命的起源。

en: He challenged the mountain at the risk of his life.
zh: 他冒着生命危险去爬那座山。

en: He has been engaged in the study of biology for nearly ten years.
zh: 他搞生物研究快十年了。

en: He is a biologist.
He is working in the field of biology.
He was engaged in biological research.
zh: 他以前是搞生物研究的。

en: He is very much interested in biology.
He cheated on the biology exam.
He is clever at biology.
He was sitting surrounded by the students.
zh: 他被学生们围坐在中间。

en: He is greatly respected by his students.
zh: 他的学生们都很尊敬他。

en: He is skillful in teaching pupils.
He is being harassed by a flood of questions from his students.
zh: 学生们问个没完，让他应接不暇。

en: He has a bad reputation with his students.
zh: 他在学生中的口碑很差。

en: He's popular with the students.
He left his students these famous words.
zh: 他给学生们留下了这些名言。

en: He told the students to be quiet.
He was a great statesman in life.
zh: 他生前是个伟大的政治家。

en: He wasn't recognized as a great writer until after his death.
zh: 他死后才被公认为伟大的作家。

en: He is a Parisian born and bred.
He is an American to the backbone.
zh: 他是个彻头彻尾的美国人。

en: He hovered between life and death.
He put forward a plan for improving the rate of production.
zh: 他提出了一个提高生产效率的方案。

en: He works hard to earn his living.
zh: 为了生活，他工作非常努力。

en: I think he needs to alter his lifestyle.
zh: 我觉得他得换种生活方式了。

en: He works for his living.
He is in great want.
He doesn't earn enough money to live on.
He's leading a dog's life.
zh: 他过着牛马不如的生活。

en: He helped poor people all his life.
zh: 他一辈子都在帮助穷人。

en: He remained a bachelor all his life.
He stayed at the same job for his whole life.
zh: 他这辈子都没换过工作。

en: He devoted his whole life to compilation of the dictionary.
zh: 他一辈子都致力于编纂这部词典。

en: He dedicated his life to helping the poor.
zh: 他一生都致力于帮助穷人。

en: He had various experiences in his life.
zh: 他这辈子阅历挺丰富的。

en: He extended the knowledge of biochemistry.
zh: 他扩展了生物化学方面的知识。

en: He was born and brought up in Tokyo.
He is a man of birth and breeding.
He is Japanese by birth.
zh: 他是土生土长的日本人。

en: He is a Londoner by birth.
zh: 他是土生土长的伦敦人。

en: He is a Russian by birth.
He is French by birth, but he is now a citizen of the USA.
zh: 他出生在法国，但现在是美国公民。

en: He was born poor, but died a millionaire.
zh: 他出生贫寒，去世时却是百万富翁。

en: He is German by birth.
He is Scottish by origin.
He is a Greek by birth.
He was born in Ohio but brought up in Texas.
zh: 他在俄亥俄州出生，在德克萨斯州长大。

en: He was a so-called aristocrat by birth.
zh: 他出身所谓的贵族家庭。

en: He is Italian by birth.
He is by nature an artist.
Nature endowed him with wit and beauty.
zh: 他天生就既聪明又漂亮。

en: He was endowed with great talents.
He is proud of the fact that he has never consulted a doctor in his life.
zh: 他挺自豪自己这辈子从没看过医生。

en: He's lived there all his life.
He has an innate love of adventure.
He is reserved by nature.
He is naturally clever.
He is lazy by nature.
His body was weak by nature.
He was assertive by nature.
He is by nature a kind person and is popular with the children in his neighborhood.
zh: 他天生心善，邻居家的小孩都很喜欢他。

en: He is by nature a kind fellow.
He is kind by nature.
He was born dumb.
He has a natural bent for music.
He is gentle by nature.
He is by nature a very quiet person.
zh: 他天生就是个很安静的人。

en: He returned to his native village, where he spent the last few years of his life.
zh: 他回到了家乡的小村子，在那儿度过了余生。

en: He made up his mind not to return to his native country.
zh: 他下定决心不再回国了。

en: He doesn't eat raw fish.
He amended his way of living.
zh: 他改变了自己的生活方式。

en: He is a sharp-shooter.
He has a very vivid imagination.
He is called a walking dictionary.
He took a lot of chances in order to survive.
zh: 为了活命，他冒了不少险。

en: He lived to be ninety.
He has spent most of his time as a career diplomat.
zh: 他职业生涯的大部分时间都是在当外交官。

en: He put on clean trousers.
zh: 他换上了一条干净的裤子。

en: He seems to be honest.
He looks like an honest man.
He must be an honest man.
He's honest, so he doesn't tell lies.
zh: 他很诚实，所以从不撒谎。

en: He is so honest that he always keeps his word.
zh: 他这人特别实在，总是说到做到。

en: He is said to be honest.
He is a square shooter.
He is too honest to tell a lie.
zh: 他太老实了，根本不会撒谎。

en: He didn't believe that honesty is the best policy.
He is a model of honesty.
He told the truth, otherwise he would have been punished.
zh: 他说了实话，不然就要受罚了。

en: He is an honest man.
He got the reputation for being an honest politician.
zh: 他得了个“诚实政治家”的名声。

en: He is an honest man and will always remain so.
zh: 他是个诚实的人，而且会一直如此。

en: I am proud of his honesty.
zh: 我为他的诚实感到自豪。

en: He gains many friends through his honesty.
zh: 他因为为人诚实而交到了很多朋友。

en: He has integrity, so he has many friends.
zh: 他为人正直，所以朋友很多。

en: He is far from being honest.
I thought he was more clever than honest.
zh: 我觉得他与其说诚实，不如说精明。

en: He is honest and hardworking, but his brother is quite otherwise.
zh: 他既诚实又勤快，但他兄弟完全不是那样。

en: He is at once honest and kind.
He is as kind as honest.
He proved to be honest.
He is stubborn, though honest.
zh: 虽然他挺诚实的，但很固执。

en: I think that he is honest.
As he is honest, he is loved by everybody.
zh: 因为他很诚实，大家都挺喜欢他的。

en: I think he is honest.
He is honest. That's why I like him.
zh: 他很诚实，这就是我喜欢他的原因。

en: He appeared honest.
He seems honest.
I doubt whether he is honest.
He wore a mask so that no one could recognize him.
zh: 他戴了个面具，好让别人认不出他来。

en: He wore a mask so no one would recognize him.
zh: 他戴着面具，为了不被人认出来。

en: He came here before noon.
zh: 他中午之前就到这儿了。

en: He will have been working for five hours by noon.
zh: 到中午的时候，他就已经干了五个小时了。

en: He did not come till noon.
He'll be here until noon.
He was to have arrived before noon.
zh: 他本该在中午之前到的。

en: He is justice.
He recovered the balance of his mind.
He was judged sane and was therefore chargeable with murder.
zh: 他被判定精神正常，因此被控谋杀。

en: He's not all there.
He has no sense of right and wrong.
He did right.
He has an eye for good English usage.
zh: 他很懂地道的英语用法。

en: I think he is right.
I think that he is right.
I think he's correct.
He has the freedom to do what he thinks is right.
zh: 他有做他认为正确的事情的自由。

en: I think he's right.
Is he right?
Is he correct?
He can not distinguish between right and wrong.
He died content with his life.
He looked up at the stars.
Many nights did he spend, looking up at the stars.
zh: 很多个晚上，他都在那儿抬头看星星。

en: He makes a living by working for a government office.
He has some acquaintance with the government people.
He was ambitious of political fame.
He has no political ambition.
He is a good speaker as politicians go.
zh: 作为政客，他口才算好的了。

en: He fulfilled the functions of a statesman.
zh: 他履行了政治家的职责。

en: He established himself as a politician.
He is not so much a politician as a merchant.
zh: 与其说他是政客，不如说他是商人。

en: He is a novelist rather than a politician.
He is not so much a politician as a scholar.
zh: 与其说他是政客，不如说他是学者。

en: He is not so much a politician as a novelist.
zh: 与其说他是政客，不如说他是小说家。

en: He was not a political figure but a religious one.
zh: 他不是政治人物，而是个宗教人物。

en: He is not a politician but a lawyer.
He is a sort of politician.
He holds an extreme opinion in politics.
zh: 他在政治上的观点很偏激。

en: He is indifferent to politics.
He has lost interest in politics.
Politics didn't interest him.
He seems to be indifferent to politics.
zh: 他看起来对政治不太关心。

en: He knows nothing about politics.
He holds only vague opinions about politics.
zh: 他对政治的看法很模糊。

en: He distanced himself from politics.
He is an influence in politics.
He has many enemies in the political world.
zh: 他在政界有很多死对头。

en: He is second to none in eloquence in the world of politics.
zh: 在政坛，论口才没人比得过他。

en: He is playing an active part in politics.
zh: 他在政界表现得很活跃。

en: On arriving at Narita, he telephoned me.
zh: 他一到成田机场就给我打了电话。

en: He started from Narita for Paris.
zh: 他从成田出发去巴黎了。

en: He went to Narita or somewhere.
zh: 他去成田或者那附近的什么地方了。

en: He invested two hundred dollars in a growing business.
zh: 他给一家有潜力的公司投了两百美金。

en: The older he grew, the more attractive he became.
He grew up to be a great person.
zh: 他长大后成了一个了不起的人。

en: He is earnest for success.
He has grown up to be a fine gentleman.
zh: 他已经长成了一个体面的绅士。

en: He grew up to be a famous musician in later years.
zh: 他后来成了著名的音乐家。

en: He grew up to be an engineer.
He grew up to be a great scientist.
zh: 他长大后成了一名伟大的科学家。

en: He grew up to be a fine youth.
zh: 他长成了一个很棒的小伙子。

en: He will struggle to graduate if he does not make progress.
zh: 如果他再没进步，毕业就悬了。

en: His grades took a big jump.
He's proud of his good grades.
zh: 他为自己的好成绩感到自豪。

en: Due to his high grades, he will inevitably be accepted to the university.
zh: 凭他的成绩，肯定能考上大学。

en: He had hoped to succeed, but in reality, he had not.
zh: 他原本希望能成功，但现实并非如此。

en: He had hoped for success, but in fact, he did not succeed.
zh: 他希望能成功，但实际上没成。

en: He had hoped to succeed, but he didn't.
zh: 他本来希望能成功，结果没成。

en: He hoped to succeed.
He is ambitious to succeed.
He is most happy about his success.
zh: 他对自己的成功感到特别高兴。

en: He is eager for success.
He is sure of success.
He works hard so as to succeed.
He spared no effort for success.
zh: 为了成功，他可是下足了功夫。

en: He persisted in his work until he succeeded.
zh: 他一直坚持工作，直到成功。

en: He persisted in the experiment until he was successful.
zh: 他一直坚持做实验，直到最后成功。

en: He paid too high a price for success.
zh: 为了成功，他付出的代价太大了。

en: I think that he will succeed.
He worked hard in order to succeed.
He is frantically on the make.
zh: 他正削尖了脑袋想往上钻。

en: I doubt if he will succeed.
zh: 我看悬，他不一定能成功。

en: They were flushed with success.
zh: 成功的喜悦让他们兴奋不已。

en: He would have succeeded.
He attributed his success to hard work.
zh: 他把成功归功于努力工作。

en: He did not feel happy for all his success.
zh: 虽然成功了，但他一点儿也高兴不起来。

en: He gave up trying, when he might have succeeded.
zh: 他在快要成功的时候放弃了。

en: He wanted to succeed.
He made it.
He succeeded.
It is in the cards that he will succeed.
He has a nice personality.
He is obstinate in disposition.
He has a mild nature.
He tried to enlarge his sphere of influence.
zh: 他想方设法扩大自己的影响力。

en: He looks his best in his uniform.
He is indifferent to worldly success.
zh: 他对名利什么的看得挺淡的。

en: He came to the throne by succession.
zh: 他是通过继承登上王位的。

en: He has no regard to appearance.
zh: 他一点儿也不在乎外表。

en: He differs from the common run of student.
zh: 他跟一般的学生不太一样。

en: He took the public by surprise.
zh: 他的举动让大家大吃一惊。

en: He is known to the public.
He's what society calls a real lover of music.
zh: 他就是大家常说的那种真正的乐迷。

en: He is a man of the world.
He made superhuman efforts to maintain world peace.
zh: 为了维护世界和平，他付出了常人难以想象的努力。

en: He helped the cause of world peace.
zh: 他为世界和平事业尽了一份力。

en: He traveled all over the world.
He traveled around the world.
He traveled all over the globe.
He is known to almost everybody throughout the world.
zh: 差不多全世界的人都认识他。

en: He had friends all over the world.
He became famous all over the world.
He is the greatest man in the world.
zh: 他是世界上最伟大的人。

en: He is one of the greatest scientists in the world.
zh: 他是世界上最伟大的科学家之一。

en: He won four successive world championships.
zh: 他连续拿了四届世界冠军。

en: He promoted the idea of world government.
zh: 他提倡建立世界政府的想法。

en: He's not in the least interested in what is happening in the world.
zh: 他对世上发生的事儿一点儿兴趣都没有。

en: He broke the world record.
He made a journey around the world.
He realized his ambition to sail around the world.
zh: 他实现了航海环游世界的梦想。

en: It is said that he is the richest man in the world.
zh: 听说他是世界上最有钱的人。

en: He traveled about the world.
He is possessed with the ambition to rule over the world.
He's famous around the world.
He is numbered among the greatest scientists in the world.
zh: 他是世界上最伟大的科学家之一。

en: He is a potential world champion.
zh: 他有成为世界冠军的潜力。

en: He is the greatest scientist that the world has ever produced.
zh: 他是世界上有史以来最伟大的科学家。

en: He is swimming against the tide.
He brought the world to its senses.
He is as great a statesman as any.
zh: 他是一个极其出色的政治家。

en: He was as great a poet as ever lived.
zh: 他是史上最伟大的诗人之一。

en: He is the greatest poet that ever lived.
zh: 他是有史以来最伟大的诗人。

en: He took out some coins.
He waited for several seconds and opened the door.
zh: 他等了几秒钟，然后开了门。

en: He died some years since.
He got very proficient in English in a few years.
zh: 没过几年，他的英语就变得非常精通了。

en: He went on a journey a few days ago.
He is off work for a few days.
He was unconscious for several days.
He comes here every few days.
zh: 他每隔几天就来这儿一趟。

en: He played on several pianos, one of which he chose.
zh: 他试弹了几架钢琴，然后选了其中一架。

en: He got acquainted with some villagers.
zh: 他和一些村民熟络了起来。

en: He will stay in Tokyo for several weeks.
zh: 他要在东京待几个星期。

en: He worked for weeks in behalf of the community chest.
zh: 为了社区基金，他忙活了好几个星期。

en: He has shown an apt for mathematics.
He asked me some questions about the math test.
zh: 他问了我几个关于数学考试的问题。

en: He is terrible at math.
He showed exceptional ability in mathematics.
zh: 他在数学方面表现出了过人的才华。

en: He got full marks in mathematics.
He is superior to me in mathematics.
He got good marks in math.
He got a good grade in mathematics.
He is second to none in mathematics.
zh: 他的数学水平数一数二。

en: He is ahead of us in mathematics.
zh: 他的数学比我们都厉害。

en: He excels in mathematics.
He has not taken the highest level evaluation, but he is good at mathematics.
zh: 虽然他还没参加最高等级的水平测试，但他数学确实很好。

en: He is good at mathematics.
He is proud of being good at mathematics.
zh: 他为自己数学好感到自豪。

en: He's proud of being good at mathematics.
zh: 他挺得意自己数学好的。

en: He likes mathematics, but I don't.
zh: 他喜欢数学，但我并不喜欢。

en: Having failed several times, he succeeded at last.
zh: 失败了几次后，他最后终于成功了。

en: He was overcome by numbers.
He made a linguistic study of languages.
zh: 他对语言进行了语言学研究。

en: He can't count.
He regarded her with worship in his eyes.
zh: 他眼里满是崇拜地看着她。

en: He is a man of noble mind.
He has changed a lot, and he is not what he was.
zh: 他变了很多，已经不是以前的那个他了。

en: He has changed a lot, and he is no longer what he used to be.
zh: 他变了好多，已经不再是以前的他了。

en: Since he is very late, he may have met with an accident on his way.
zh: 他迟到这么久，路上可能出事了。

en: He was fined five pounds for drunken driving.
zh: 他因为酒驾被罚了五英镑。

en: He was drunk and his speech was thick.
zh: 他喝多了，说话都开始大舌头了。

en: He was too drunk to remember to shut the back door.
zh: 他醉得连后门都忘了关了。

en: He was drunk and forgot to shut the back door.
He is a little high.
He is out of control when drunk.
He will drive home, though he is drunk.
zh: 尽管喝醉了，他还是要开车回家。

en: He is too drunk to drive home.
zh: 他醉得没法开车回家了。

en: He carried on at his work eventually.
zh: 他最后还是继续工作了。

en: He finally succeeded in climbing that mountain.
zh: 他终于成功登上了那座山。

en: He hoped to be a sailor.
He didn't meet the standards.
He used water colors in short vertical brush-strokes.
zh: 他用水彩画了一些短的垂直笔触。

en: He is adept in swimming.
He has built up his health through swimming.
zh: 他通过游泳锻炼好了身体。

en: He holds a record in swimming.
zh: 他保持着一项游泳纪录。

en: He didn't care for swimming.
He is a good swimmer and also plays tennis well.
zh: 他游泳游得好，网球打得也不错。

en: He can't swim.
He cannot swim.
He left the water running.
zh: 他没关水龙头，让水一直流着。

en: He must have left the water running.
zh: 他肯定忘了关水龙头了。

en: He drank three glasses of water.
He is tremendously handsome.
He asked for a drink of water.
He dived into the water and came up for air.
zh: 他跳进水里，然后浮上来换气。

en: He jumped into the water.
He took some deep breaths before he dived.
zh: 他潜水前深吸了几口气。

en: He drank the whisky as if it were water.
zh: 他喝威士忌跟喝水似的。

en: He jumped across the puddle.
He amused himself by reading a detective story.
He reads detective stories on occasion.
He belongs to the brass band.
He had the nerve to say that.
Does he still have that book he borrowed from the library?
zh: 他从图书馆借的那本书还在他那儿吗？

en: He still hasn't returned the book he borrowed from the library.
zh: 他从图书馆借的书还没还。

en: He explained by means of diagrams.
He illustrated his theory with diagrams.
zh: 他用图表展示了他的理论。

en: He lives in a farmhouse remote from the world.
zh: 他住在一个与世隔绝的农舍里。

en: Living as he did in the remote countryside, he seldom came into town.
zh: 因为住在偏远的农村，他很少进城。

en: He lived in a house remote from the village.
zh: 他住的房子离村子很远。

en: He was praised for saving a life.
zh: 他因为救人受到了表扬。

en: He was proud that he was selected by the people.
zh: 他为能被大家选中感到很自豪。

en: He was a god to his people.
zh: 他在自己的人民心中就像神一样。

en: He is an authority on the humanities.
zh: 他是人文科学方面的权威。

en: He cannot afford the common comforts of life.
zh: 他连普通的生活开销都负担不起。

en: He's fed up with socializing.
She is not so much unsociable as bashful.
zh: 她与其说是孤僻，倒不如说是害羞。
